title: Womens Dress Cocktail Ruched
title_original: Popilush Shapewear Corset Dress Women's Satin Ruched Midi Dress Cocktail Date Night Classy Dresses with Lace Trim Bra

specs.Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here
specs.Best Sellers Rank: #89,302 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #202 in Women's Cocktail Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Cocktail

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits like a glove!
items.body: Ok so I am 5’0” 158lbs I am a 36 DDD in bra size. I am an apple shape. I did not have high hopes for this dress. Boy did that change! As an autumn, I was nervous that the red was going to be bright and cool. It isn’t! Is more of a deep wine red. The fabric is great quality and silky soft. The built in shapewear is comfortable and stretchy, but also moves with you while holding you tight. I was afraid the girls weren’t going to fit, but they do! I put this on and never wanted to take it off! It’s PERFECTION! I got a large in the red! Read more
items.author: Rachel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very flattering holiday dress
items.body: The most beautiful and flattering dress! Got so many compliments on it! Perfect for xmas party! Read more
items.author: Hi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Impressive
items.body: Wore this dress out for a birthday party and received compliments the entire night. Read more
items.author: Jmond

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really beautiful
items.body: Ok this dress is gorgeous. I really love it. The ONLY issue is: I ordered a large, and it barely fits my chest. It has underwire and luckily the swoop part covers the girls because if not there would certainly be a peep show. Also: I am almost 5'10 and 36DD, and this dress is almost too short from the top part. I wish the straps let out just a little bit more. I may try and XL and see if there is a little more give on top. Gorgeous though! Read more
items.author: Nic

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth it! Buy it!
items.body: The dress is worth every penny. Read more
items.author: anthony baiardi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a night out
items.body: This dress is absolutely stunning! The satin feels smooth and luxurious, and the ruched design accentuates curves beautifully. The built-in lace trim bra provides support without feeling uncomfortable. Perfect for date nights or cocktail parties. Read more
items.author: Reh

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Ruched is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Ruched is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Black, Floral. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
